programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Blowing bubbles, stretching taffy, optical illusion - all of these have to do with Maths. In fact, mathematicians spend a lot of time on these because behind these seemingly simple and fun activities is complex Maths that has helped Architecture, Medicine and even Art. Along the way, we meet the cousin of the famous Golden Ratio - the Silver Ratio. This episode does not just look at how Maths is fun, it looks at the Maths in all the fun things we do.

How will it taste?We also meet up with hunks and buddies Lawrence Wong and Chuando as they enjoy European cuisine at the picturesque Gardens by the Bay. What do they have to say about the food? Don't miss our final episode! “午餐吃什么？”两位实力派演员陈泓宇和姚彣隆来到中峇鲁吃肉骨茶，泓宇一家人是这里的常客，他们最爱哪几道菜呢？为了品尝彣隆的拿手招牌泡饭，主持人特地来到马来西亚新山！到底味道有何惊喜？节目下半场，高颜值的陈传多和王冠逸是认识多年的好友，注重饮食的两人推荐这家位于滨海湾花园的欧式餐馆，这里的菜有何特色？千万别错过最后一集的精彩内容！.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 3
programme.desc: Zhengbin apologizes to Dongshan but he refuses to accept it and even beats him up. Yichen appears in the nick of time to stop Dongshan. Zhengbin feels comforted as Yichen helps to apply medication on his wounds. He recalls how Dongshan has saved him from being bullied when he was young, and is grateful to Dongshan for taking him in as his disciple. He has since regarded Dongshan as his father. (PG)正斌向东山道歉，东山不接受，生气地对正斌拳打脚踢，正斌不敢还手，幸好逸晨及时出现，劝阻东山。逸晨帮正斌敷药，正斌感温暖。正斌想起年少无依的自己被不良少年欺负，是东山救了他，还收他为徒。正斌铭感于心，视东山为父亲。.

programme.desc: (R) Caiyue (flower fairy) was cheated by nine-tail vixen and caused the death of Tangseng. Su Wukong was devastated and swore never forgive Caiyue forever! Caiyue pleads the Goddess of mercy for leniency. Sensing her sincere repentance, the Goddess grants her a time frame of a thousand years, to allow Caiyue to ask for Su Wukong's forgiveness and reverses the whole incident. (PG)(重)采月（花仙子）受九尾狐所惑，导致唐僧惨死西天取经路上。孙悟空悲痛不已，立誓永世不原谅采月！采月向观音菩萨苦求，菩萨大发慈悲，赐于她一千年时限，让她寻找转世孙悟空，求得对方谅解，扭转乾坤。转眼来到时限最后一年，采月在土地公协助下，找到转世悟空赵耀进……。.

锁住味道 The Successor - EP 2

Since 10, Master Chen has been selling Tutu Kueh with her father along Bugis street. Will her 50-year recipe be able to be handed down to the next generation? (重)嘟嘟糕的由来得追溯到上个世纪年代，一群从福建南来的陈姓先辈，共同将家乡美食——松糕，改良成如今的嘟嘟糕。嘟嘟糕师傅陈金辉，今年六十五岁，自小和姐姐陈金兰，跟随父亲身边，学习制作嘟嘟糕。陈金辉师傅从10岁起，便开始在武吉士一带沿街叫卖。如今，师傅的儿女都无意继承这项手艺，那相传超越50年的嘟嘟糕秘方，还可以传给谁呢？.

(重)《名厨出走记》是个另类的美食节目. 制作队安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。也借由节目，让厨师利用他们的长才为落后地区付出他们的一份力. 该节目荣获《红星大奖》多个奖项，而《精华版》更收集了该节目最精彩的集数，让观众重温厨师们的苦与乐！.

programme.title: 仁心侠旅 The Activist's Journey - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) (重)2010年，新传媒艺人白薇秀首次参与一个“不让她美起来”的电视制作。她将深入印度的血汗工厂、泰北的孤儿院、马尼拉的垃圾山等，亲睹社会的剥削不平之相，感受种种困境背后的人性明暗。社会最底层被遗忘的的心声，对受过新闻专业训练的薇秀而言，是一把什么样的声音？对她有多大多深的冲击？.

However, Li Jiang says he needs the boundary to prevent his ancestral land from being preyed on by the developers. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(重)至全成功抵达上凹口村，与李江见面。至全告诉李江他的结界害了很多人，希望李江把结界收了。李江说他曾经解开结界，但土地发展商立刻想来发展土地。他为了保护李家的土地，不会再解界。.

programme.title: 真命小和尚之十二 铜人 The Return Of Royal Monk - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Kaixin as the abbot of Wulong Temple. The disciplinary master Kongli, who thinks highly of himself, feels slighted that a mere child is made the head of the monastery. Kaixin often thinks of Tietong and is surprised to find someone who looks exactly like his late senior. Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。.

programme.title: 客人来咯！ Please Be My Guest! - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, the two families are either covering up their unsightly pieces of furniture with cloth or moving them to one corner of the hose. Please Be My Guest will teach them as well as viewers the long term solution for the lack of storage space! Celebrity Judge: Seraph Sun. (重)收纳空间不足是许多新加坡人面对的家居问题。这一集，《客人来咯！》就又带领两个家庭解决这个问题。想知道两家状况如何，记得收看《客人来咯！》.

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 97
programme.desc: (R) We never knew that the best of nasi lemak and the quirkiest folks could be found in Holland V... Recapture the aroma with the encore telecast. (重)新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。.

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 98
programme.desc: (R) We never knew that the best of nasi lemak and the quirkiest folks could be found in Holland V... Recapture the aroma with the encore telecast. programme.title: 摩尔庄园 Mole's World - EP 0033 & 0034
programme.desc: (R) This is the story of ordinary little Moer - Mo Lele who uses his super power to transform into LeLe Knight to fight against the evil witch Kula and protect the manor. (重)摩尔庄园动画片讲述了一个普通的小摩尔——摩乐乐利用自己的超能力变身乐乐侠，对抗邪恶巫师库拉，保护庄园的故事。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 196
programme.desc: This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 石器时代: 寻找传说中的宠物 Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 0029, 0030, 0031 & 0032
programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 8
programme.desc: Fort Canning is an iconic hilltop landmark that has undergone many of Singapore's milestones. Besides a archaeological dig with artefacts from the 14th century, you can also savour a bowl of traditional Bak Kut Teh! Come along on an exciting adventure at Fort Canning! 拥有700年历史的福康宁山，曾经是禁山、皇家山和军事基地！这里不仅有保存14世纪的文物，也有现代多媒体的展览！至今还能吃到“皇家山脚”的肉骨茶！一起和两位搜密组员探索我们你不知道的福康宁山！.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. Every individual has their own characteristics and beliefs. Each of them are passionate about lives, and hold unique opinions about the society. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. (重)“星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。.

programme.title: 最家选择 No Place Like Home - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Young couples on the verge of marriage often have one major concern on their minds - a new flat. And they should. It's an important step but just how do they go about making that decision on the type of flat to buy? Is it really as simple as choosing between a BTO flat or a resale flat? Or do Ben and Chloe - an engaged couple, have many many other variables to take into account? (重)正要结婚的新婚夫妇，必然会面对买房子的问题。到底该买一间BTO，还是买一间转售组屋呢？要买多大的房子？要住在那里？一连串的疑问，总会在脑海里浮现，挥之不去。就像这一集的Ben和Chloe一样，他们已经订婚了，并准备买一间房子。但和许多正要结婚的夫妇一样，他们发现还有许多因素他们必须考量。.

programme.title: 团圆饭 Reunion Dinner - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The reunion dinner is very significant to Chinese: it is the gathering of the family. Through the characters' insistence on and "frenzied" preparations for the Reunion Dinner, the serial brings out the importance of the family. (重)演员:陈莉萍饰阿萍;王昱清饰梁天华;陈汉玮饰刘家昌;莫小玲饰林芳芳;鐘琴饰Banana;唐育书饰胡达雄.

programme.title: 团圆饭 Reunion Dinner - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The reunion dinner is very significant to Chinese: it is the gathering of the family. programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) With a heart bigger than his shop size, Jason is a rare gem in Marine Crescent. He runs the neighbourhood mobile shop quite unlike the ones we see enroute home from the mrt station. As the saying goes, attitude makes a man, and Jasons made him the superhero in this area made up mainly of our pioneer generation. Watch as this miniscule shop transform into a tech hub! (重)每一个邻里都有一些小店铺。在杂乱无章的小店里，累积了许多温馨感人的小故事。主持人李心钰将带着一位室内设计师走进这些有故事的店，为店面改头换面，让店主能在更好的环境继续营业。.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Originating in Guangzhou, Wanton Mee is one of Singapore's favourite noodle dish. Since last century, the wanton soup has evolved to dry noodles mixed with white, black and red sauces. In this episode, host Yi Feng and Chef Benson recreate the old taste by using a bamboo pole to make the noodles. (重)源自广州的云吞面，是本地人最喜欢的面食之一。上世纪初来流传到南洋后，云吞汤面被做成干捞的，发展出了白、黑和红三派拌面酱汁。这一集主持人和厨师唐本陞找来竹竿打面制作竹昇面，以还原百分之百的古早味！.

programme.title: 阿公来做饭 Ah Gong Can Cook - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Ah Gong goes all out to impress Kym and Yingying with a scrumptious feast! In return, the pair has to win Ah Gong's heart by recreating his famous Glutinous Rice. Will Yingying be able to defeat Kym by winning the favours of Ah Gong and Chef Charlie? Stay tune! (重)喜欢烹煮山珍海味的阿公登场啦，让鐘琴和何莹盈都看傻了眼！这回，阿公将带来他的拿手好菜之一，糯米饭。受尽男士们欢迎的莹盈能不能打败阿姐，获得阿公的芳心呢？敬请期待《阿公来做饭》！.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Hong Yi hints to Ya Yun that he has feelings for her. However Ya Yun is clear to him that she is not ready to be in a relationship. Hong Yi understands and does not pressure her. (PG)(重)宏毅暗示雅芸自己喜欢她，雅芸表明现阶段不想谈感情，宏毅也不勉强。雅芸从宏毅口中得知，广达曾买蛋糕去公司给喜欢的人，雅芸想起广达曾买过蛋糕请她吃的事，怀疑广达喜欢她，开始对他保持距离。.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) There has been a leakage of vital information from the company, causing chaos. An IT safety specialist is hired, who turns out to be Hong Yi's ex-girlfriend Regina. Regina ridicules Hong Yi openly, much to the bewilderment of everyone. (PG)(重)公司客户资料外泄，惹来风波。精诚经朋友介绍，请来网络安全顾问协助，没想到此人竟是宏毅的前女友Regina。Regina故意在众人面前嘲讽宏毅，宏毅不敢吭声，大家感觉两人关系不简单。原来宏毅曾经用sms跟Regina分手。.

programme.desc: A martial arts instructor from the police force gets imprisoned after killing a man by accident. But when a vicious killer starts targeting martial arts masters, the instructor offers to help the police in return for his freedom. (PG-些许暴力画面).

programme.desc: (R) Hugo reveals his identity and officially takes over the Centenarian Home. He even fires Mei Fang to force her to admit everything but she strongly denies. Xin Xin returns to the Centenarian Home, on the first night of her return, Mei Fang secretly sneaks in to carry out her revenge on Xin Xin! Yichen accidentally dirties Shuya's clothes and Zhengbin offers to gift her another one to help Yichen out of the predicament. The trio proceeds to shop for clothes and Shuya wants Zhengbin to choose one as a gift in return. Yichen feels dejected as she witnesses the pair bantering. (PG)正斌、逸晨和舒雅一起到小食店吃东西，正斌不经意的举动总是让舒雅想起逸风的温柔。逸晨不小心弄脏了舒雅的衣服，正斌为逸晨解围，说要送舒雅一件衣服。三人一起去买衣服，舒雅要正斌也选一件，作为回礼。逸晨看着两人的互动，深感失落。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 女人好健康 Good Health Women - EP 7
programme.desc: Darren hosts this new healthcare program that explores both Western & traditional approaches to womens illnesses from a male perspective. 主持庄文杰这次担任女人健康大使，找来中医、西医、物理治疗师从多个角度分享女人健康密码，了解与预防女人常见的毛病如经痛，中风，慢性疲劳等等。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak heads to Lake Hamana in Japan to learn about eel farming and takes a look at rice farming technology in Shizuoka. He is back to his hometown to learn about the cultivation of Thai jasmine rice. Cui Fang heads to Pontian, Malaysia to learn about local offshore fishing operation. (重)在这一集的节目中，Pornsak前往日本滨松市滨名湖了解鳗鱼养殖。他也前往静冈一窥日本的水稻种植技术，再回到故乡泰国了解茉莉香米的种植。而林翠芳则前往马来西亚笨珍，了解当地渔民的近海捕捞作业。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 59
programme.desc: (R) Haizhu overheard Zhiyuan reveal that Ruli's father, Sun Zhuhao, is still alive. Jiaya is in critical condition, Haizhu pleads with Ruli to help her save Jiaya. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海珠偷听到如莉父亲孙柱浩还活着,大吃一惊.嘉亚情况危急, 海珠求如莉尽快救嘉亚.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 60
programme.desc: (R) Learning that Jiaya is critically ill, Xiaochun agrees to donate her bone marrow to save him. While fetching Xiaochun to the hospital, Ruli receives news about her father and turns back. Haizhu sees Ruli detour and misunderstood that she changed her mind about saving Jiaya. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)小春愿意捐骨髓救嘉亚。当如莉带小春去医院途中接到父亲消息便反回路线，海珠以为如莉改变心意。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) The worm incident severely affected the business at Nanyang eatery. Tai Hu disclosed that Hao Lun is the traitor who took his money and betrayed the Nanyang eatery. Hao Lun tried to defend himself in vain. Tai Long was very hurt. The cohesive team that they once were became a thing of the past. (PG)(重)小吃店生意再陷低潮，美薇找来知名食评品尝店里的招牌美食，怎知试吃过程被泰龙搞砸。泰虎揭发浩伦就是出卖小吃店的内鬼。浩伦百口莫辩，泰龙失望又难过。本来四人组成的团队，变成了一盘散沙。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Malta is known as the heart of the Mediterranean and a transiting centre for African and Middle Eastern refugees who were desperately fleeing to Europe in early years. Malta has accepted these refugees since 2002. Let's follow the fixer to find out about these refugees and listen to their stories. (重)有地中海心脏之称的马耳他，是欧洲游客的度假胜地。早年曾是非洲和中东难民越洋出逃，汲汲登陆欧洲的中转站。自零二年开始，马尔他就接受这一批批的难民，让我们随线人准备踏上这条难民课题的列车，聆听他们的故事。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai wants Hengkui to help Dongchu financially, but Hengkui claims that he does not have the means to. Shanyu blames Zhen-ai for spoiling everyone's mood on Hengkui's birthday. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱知道东出又闯祸后，要亨奎出钱帮助家人，但亨奎却说他没钱，真爱于是跟他大吵一架。珊玉责怪真爱在亨奎生日当天让大家不开心。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Changxian goes to Minhe's company as a reporter and kidnaps Fengshun. Changxian straps a bomb on Fengshun and chains her to the door of the exhaust pipe room on the top floor. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)长贤以记者的身分来到敏赫的公司，绑架了奉顺。长贤在奉顺身上绑了一枚炸弹，将她锁在顶楼的排气管间里。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 61
programme.desc: Though Xiaochun reaches the hospital in time, Jiaya had unfortunately passed on. Daoying is shocked to learn that Cui Meixi is Jiaya's donor and is back for Haizhu. Haizhu vows to take revenge on Ruli over Jiaya's death. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)即使小春赶到医院，嘉亚等不了不幸去世。崔美熙是嘉亚的捐献者令道英吃惊，同时她也声称为海珠而回来的。对嘉亚的过世，海珠要向如莉报仇。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 62
programme.desc: Zhiyuan warns Cui Meixi not to see Haizhu. Haizhu kidnaps Zhuhao, who has amnesia, to stop him from seeing Ruli. She is shocked when Zhuhao reveals that Ruli is Zhiyuan's biological daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛警告美熙不要接近海珠。海珠软禁患有失忆症的柱浩，避免他与如莉见面。听到柱浩说出如莉是智媛的女儿，大感震惊。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 7
programme.desc: In China, 1 in every 13 Chinese is potentially down on depression. Jojo Goh visits a youth centre in Beijing that runs a boot camp-like program for depressed youths, and an organisation in Hangzhou that relies on a personal support network. What is the biggest obstacle in the fight against depression? 数据显示，中国有将近1亿名忧郁症患者。每13名中国人当中，就有一人患病。吴俐璇亲访北京一家帮助青少年患者的青年康复中心，也前去杭州了解推动心理健康的慈善组织如何进行科普，说服更多中国患者及时求医。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 11
programme.desc: Daxiong is uncooperative when Wuzhou wants him to bring Shangbi out of Seoul. Guangdong lures Shangbi to a high-rise building where Shangbi witnesses Daxiong's death. Shangbi is charged with Daxiong's murder. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)五洲要大雄把尚弼带离首尔，大雄却不肯合作。冠东把大雄弄晕后拨电给尚弼。尚弼赶到时，想抓住即将坠楼的大雄，却无能为力。大雄身亡，尚弼被控谋杀。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Volunteers often leave their creature comforts for unfamiliar environments. They seek to improve the lives of others, and in doing so, they unknowingly altered their lives, as well. What hardships do they face and are they mentally prepared for this journey? (重)为了改善别人的生活，许多义工不惜从舒适圈出走，去到陌生、落后的国度。很多人都没有想到，在改变别人以前，他们首先改变了自己的人生。当踌躇满志的义工踏上柬埔寨这片千疮百孔的土地传递温暖的时候，做了什么心理准备？又面对了什么挑战？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The method of using salt to marinate fish in the East and West is quite similar. Be it air-dried, canned, eaten directly or cooked, each has its own flavour. This episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce the production and ways of eating salted fish and marinated fish from the East and West. (重)东西方以盐腌制鱼类的方法大同小异，不管是风干或是晾干，做成罐头还是旋吊晾卖，直接食用还是烹煮做菜，各有不同风味，异曲同工，异中求同。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍东西方盐腌制鱼类的制作与吃法。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai finds out that Shanyu wants to end her business for Hengkui's sake. Zhen-ai understands how important the business is for Shanyu. She thus decides not to rent an apartment and instead uses the money to help Shanyu continue with her business. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱发现珊玉为了亨奎，要结束小菜店的生意。真爱明白小菜店对珊玉的重要性，于是取消租约，把贷款回来的钱交给房东，让珊玉继续经营小菜店。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun goes over to Minhe's house and makes breakfast for the two hungover men. After breakfast, the three begin to discuss the plan to arrest Changxian even as Changxian is placed on a nationwide most-wanted alert. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺来敏赫家，为两个喝醉酒的男人做早餐。吃完了早饭，敏赫，国斗与奉顺三个人开始讨论如何逮捕长贤。警察厅也已经发布了实名通缉令。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 63
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is surprised to see Daozhi and Ruli together with Cui Meixi in the office. Haizhu realizes that Zhuhao adopted Ruli from young and Zhiyuan is biologically related to Ruli from the DNA report. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)在公司里，智媛很惊讶看到道治和如莉认识崔美熙。从亲子报告海珠发现如莉从小就被柱浩令养而智媛是如莉亲生母亲。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 64
programme.desc: Ruli informs Daozhi that Zhiyuan has another daughter beside Haizhu. Daoying tells Haizhu that Cui Meixi is her biological mother but Haizhu could not accept the fact. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉告知道治处了海珠之外，智媛还有一个女儿当下落不明。道英透露给海珠崔美熙是她的亲生母亲，海珠无法接受事实。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 2
programme.desc: Each missing person represents a broken family. According to statistics from the Taiwan Police Department, Taiwan has nearly 25,000 people reported missing and more than 200 unknown bodies have been uncovered every year. Why do people go missing in Taiwan? 每一名失踪人口，代表一个破碎家庭。根据台湾警政署资料统计，台湾平均每年通报受理将近2万5千起失踪人口，两百多具无名尸体被发现的案例。茫茫人海，寻人好比大海捞针，怎么可能容易？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 12
programme.desc: Daxiong's murder case starts legal proceedings. The witness arranged by Guangdong claims to have seen Shangbi murdered Daxiong, but loses his footing when he is questioned by Zaiyi. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)崔大雄命案第一次公审。目击证人是冠东安排的。目击证人坚称他看到尚弼杀人，但被在伊盘问后露出破绽。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Every dawn and dusk, Wei Guang, an old man in his seventies, will come to the Cavenagh Bridge and stand there waiting. This is the place where he first met his first and only love, Hui Yi. Hui Yi was from a rich family and Wei Guang was just a poor chap. Their love was forbidden by her parents and they were forced to break up. They decided to elope and used a riddle as the clue to their rendezvous point. Dan, Mie and Juliana are avid cyclists who met on Cavenagh Bridge and became buddies. Dan fell in love at first sight with Juliana, Mie holds a torch for Dan, and Juliana flirts with Mie all the time. One day, Dan challenged Juliana to a race, and the loser must agree to one request from the winner. Mie suddenly disappeared before the race, and resurfaced with a brand new look after the race, which throws this threesome into a new form of love triangle... (重)每天清晨和傍晚，七旬老翁伟光都会来到加纹纳桥上，呆呆伫立桥中央，似乎在等着什么人。他到底在等谁？这个人会不会再出现？原来，同样在这座桥上，他邂逅了他的初恋情人，也是唯一情人，慧仪。可是，慧仪是千金小姐，所以两人被女方的父亲棒打鸳鸯，被迫分离。两人毅然决定私奔，并且利用一道灯谜来互通会合地点……偏偏伟光没有能够参透灯谜，等到他揭开谜底的时候，慧仪早已经被父亲送走。五十年来，伟光就每天都回来桥上，希望有一天，慧仪真的能出现，履行承诺…… 阿丹和小米、茱莲娜因为骑车在桥上相遇，很快成为无所不谈的朋友。阿丹对茱莲娜一见钟情，小米对阿丹刻骨铭心，茱莲娜却和小米暧昧不断。有一天，阿丹决定约茱莲娜比赛，只要谁赢了，就能要求对方做一件事情。小米却在比赛前就人间蒸发，等到比赛完毕后，才以全新的姿态出现，把三角关系“复杂明朗化"…….

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The factory's ceiling collapses on the day Yingshan brings her business partners for a visit. Zhen-ai pushes Yingshan away from the collapsed ceiling and gets drenched by wastewater herself. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)工厂的天花板在英善接见中国合作商当天大漏水。眼见英善即将被废水淋湿，真爱把她推开，自己被淋成落汤鸡。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Changxian, who is on the run, finally contacts Fengshun. The two agree to meet face to face. Minhe and Guodou also joined forces to capture Changxian. Minhe uses a drone to track Changxian, and at the same time guided Guodou to force Changxian into the trap set by the police. Changxian is finally arrested under the joint effort of the three. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)—直在逃亡的长贤终於联络奉顺，双方约定正面对决，而敏赫和国斗也联手参与抓犯人的行动。敏赫用飞行摄像机紧跟长贤的行踪，同时指导着国斗将长贤逼进了众人设下的陷阱中。长贤最终在三人合力下被捕归案。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 65
programme.desc: While escaping from Zhiyuan, Zhuhao avoids an accident with help from Daozhi. Ruli is saddened that her father cannot recognize her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)柱浩逃离智媛的软禁而差点遇车祸，幸好被道治救了一命。因父亲无法认得她，如莉感到伤心。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 66
programme.desc: Haizhu arranges a family dinner and invites Cui Meixi along. Haizhu declares to Cui Meixi that Zhiyuan is still her mother and asks her to return to the States. Zhuhao regains his memory and resumes his work for Daoying who panics at the sight of Zhuhao. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠安排全家一起吃饭，也邀请崔美熙。她对崔美熙声称智媛永远是她的母亲，希望她回美国。柱浩恢复记忆，重回司机工作，道英一看到他，大吃一惊。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 13
programme.desc: Xianzhu looks up Zaiyi at the law firm and tells her that Daxiong has arranged for her to work as Wenshu's masseur. She passes a few photographs to Zaiyi and assures Zaiyi that they have a common enemy. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)贤珠到事务所找在伊，说大雄生前安排她担任文淑的按摩师，并把几张照片交给在伊。贤珠说她跟在伊等人有共同的敌人 - 车文淑。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 65
programme.desc: (R) While escaping from Zhiyuan, Zhuhao avoids an accident with help from Daozhi. Ruli is saddened that her father cannot recognize her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)柱浩逃离智媛的软禁而差点遇车祸，幸好被道治救了一命。因父亲无法认得她，如莉感到伤心。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 66
programme.desc: (R) Haizhu arranges a family dinner and invites Cui Meixi along. Haizhu declares to Cui Meixi that Zhiyuan is still her mother and asks her to return to the States. Zhuhao regains his memory and resumes his work for Daoying who panics at the sight of Zhuhao. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海珠安排全家一起吃饭，也邀请崔美熙。她对崔美熙声称智媛永远是她的母亲，希望她回美国。柱浩恢复记忆，重回司机工作，道英一看到他，大吃一惊。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: 巾帼女将 Women Warriors - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Join Paige as she tracks down Clae, a female miner in Baguio who confidently inserts dynamites to blast rocks for gold mining. Find out what this bold young lady has to say to her grandfather, now that she has fulfilled her promise to him. (重)巾帼女将是一个表扬21世纪女性的节目。这系列一一列出所有有关女性种种美妙和美好的一面，从受访者轻松女性化的追逐到激烈行为的工作经历。每一集，绮慧将了解在地受访者以什么工作谋生。同时，在激烈的工作和训练中，她也了解受访者如何享受社交和家庭生活。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Aidan tries to kill himself but enters the supernatural realm to see the old lady instead. He finds out that as part of the power of "True Liar", his life belongs to her and so he is unable to kill himself. Desperate, Aidan tells De Hua that he is no longer the "True Liar" and no longer a human lie detector. The next morning, Aidan wakes up to see that he can no longer see the lie counter above his head. He arrives at the office and is enamoured with Mei Qi and proclaims his love for her. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)Aidan万念俱灰自杀，却进入迷离境界见到老太婆。老太婆告诉他，大话精的生死由不得他，而是在她手中。Aidan气煞对德华撒谎说他不再是大话精，也不是谎言侦察机！Aidan对德华测试了几个谎言，确定了他再没有使谎话成真的能力，也不再是谎言侦察机后。次晨Aidan醒来，发现自己心情出奇的好，也看不见大家头顶上的数目字。到了公司，Aidan见到美琪便无法自拔地被她吸引，Nadia以为Aidan是故意要刺激她。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Each missing person represents a broken family. According to statistics from the Taiwan Police Department, Taiwan has nearly 25,000 people reported missing and more than 200 unknown bodies have been uncovered every year. Why do people go missing in Taiwan? (重)每一名失踪人口，代表一个破碎家庭。根据台湾警政署资料统计，台湾平均每年通报受理将近2万5千起失踪人口，两百多具无名尸体被发现的案例。茫茫人海，寻人好比大海捞针，怎么可能容易？.

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 55
programme.desc: (R) Meina tells Yunjing about her relationship with Yuncan when Yuncan refuses to acknowledge Tongbai as his daughter. Yunjing questions Yuncan who continues to insist that Meina is lying because she is after their fortunes. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)美娜见允灿不肯承认桐白是他的女儿，于是将她和允灿的关系告诉允晶。允晶回家质问允灿。允灿坚持美娜是觊觎他们家的财产，所以撒谎。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 56
programme.desc: (R) Xiuzi suspects that Haixiu and Yuzhen are an item when she hears that Haixiu's matchmaking session ends badly. Yuzhen admits that he likes Haixiu. Xiuzi objects to their relationship as she thinks Haixiu cannot match up to Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀子听说海秀的相亲搞砸了，怀疑宇真和海秀真的在一起。宇真承认喜欢海秀，但秀子觉得海秀配不起宇真，不赞成他们继续发展。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Fengxiu confesses his love to Yingxin but Yingxin turns him down. Dongyuan suspects something amiss when Huang Zaiguo dies shortly after his visit. He goes to Huang's house again to search for clues. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)峰秀鼓起勇气向英信告白，自愿代替她所暗恋的那神出鬼没的Healer，陪在她身边，但英信拒绝了他。东元接到黄在国在他拜访后突然自杀死了的消息后，怀疑事情不简单，便再去他家查看有何线索。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Zhenghou's mentor asks Zhenghou to find out who murdered his father and gives Zhenghou a clue - to look for Wenhao. Zhenghou thus sneaks into Wenhao's house to search for clues. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英信很想念Healer，想电邮他委托他做事，也想见到他一面。正厚的师傅叫他去查清楚他父亲是被谁杀的,并给了他一个线索：去找当年为他们五人拍照的文植的弟弟文浩，也许能找出答案。正厚于是偷偷潜入文浩的家搜索。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 19
programme.desc: Douyu gives Zhiyan a necklace and confesses to her that he has admired her for a long time. He hopes to travel with her to Iceland after the completion of the "King's Bag" battle mission. Ailin learns that the code name of Jinben is Terrius. She also wants to have a code name for herself. Hence, Jinben calls her Alice. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)斗宇送给智妍一条项链，并向她表白已经喜欢她很久了，并且希望等到“王的皮包"作战结束后，能够与她一起去冰岛旅行。爱麟得知金本的代号是陶斯，她也想给自己起一个代号，金本便唤爱麟为爱丽丝。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 20
programme.desc: Jinben obtained the document from the vault but He was blocked by killer K when he was about to escape. In the chaos, Jinben passed the document to Ailin and asked her to send it to the "King's Bag" office while he stayed to fight with K. Ailin heard gunshots from Yin Chunshang's house when she ran out from the place. (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩)金本成功打开了保险柜拿到了文件，正要逃跑时，却被随即赶来的杀手K堵住。慌乱之下，金本只好将文件交给爱麟，让她送到”王的皮包”，自己则留下来与K对峙。爱麟抱着文件跑出去时，听见尹春尚的家里传来枪声。。。。。。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Renya feels sad when she knows Zhenyu is suffering from Memory Overload Syndrome. The General Manager advises Renya to pretend that she does not know about Zhenyu's illness and carry out his wishes for his remaining lifespan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)知道振宇得了"过剩记忆症候群"病后，仁雅感到很难过。事务长劝仁雅在振宇面前假装不知他得病的事，再加上振宇所剩的时间不多了，一切就按他的意望去做。.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, popstars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。.

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Pig's organ soup. Kway chap. Sup tulang. While some may consider them roadside oddities, Singaporeans embrace them as national treasures. Join us on Food Empire as we dissect the Singaporean take on nose-to-tail dining. (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak heads to Lake Hamana in Japan to learn about eel farming and takes a look at rice farming technology in Shizuoka. He is back to his hometown to learn about the cultivation of Thai jasmine rice. Cui Fang heads to Pontian, Malaysia to learn about local offshore fishing operation. (重)在这一集的节目中，Pornsak前往日本滨松市滨名湖了解鳗鱼养殖。他也前往静冈一窥日本的水稻种植技术，再回到故乡泰国了解茉莉香米的种植。而林翠芳则前往马来西亚笨珍，了解当地渔民的近海捕捞作业。.

programme.title: 健康在于你 11 Here's To Health 11 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In "Here's to Health 11", our host Lim Peifen will discuss various health issues and share how we can promote healthy living with probiotics. She will also shed light on the importance of prevention to encourage everyone to eat and live healthily. (重)(最后一集)《健康在于你11》新系列节目再次邀请主持人林佩芬和大家一起探讨各种健康课题，分享如何通过益生菌保健，展开健康生活，阐明预防胜于治疗与自我保健的重要性，希望大家都能吃得健康、活得健康。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) In China, 1 in every 13 Chinese is potentially down on depression. Jojo Goh visits a youth centre in Beijing that runs a boot camp-like program for depressed youths, and an organisation in Hangzhou that relies on a personal support network. What is the biggest obstacle in the fight against depression? (重)数据显示，中国有将近1亿名忧郁症患者。每13名中国人当中，就有一人患病。吴俐璇亲访北京一家帮助青少年患者的青年康复中心，也前去杭州了解推动心理健康的慈善组织如何进行科普，说服更多中国患者及时求医。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 57
programme.desc: (R) Haixiu tries to convince Xiuzi to accept her, but Xiuzi shames her for being unrealistic. Yuzhen and Xiuzi quarrel over Haixiu. Xiuzi slaps Yuzhen. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀尝试说服秀子接受她，却被秀子指没有自知之明。宇真听到海秀和秀子的对话，觉得秀子很过分。两母子为了海秀吵架，秀子还打了宇真一巴掌。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 58
programme.desc: (R) The DNA report reveals that Yuncan and Tongbai are biologically related. Yuncan tells Meina that he will provide for Meina and Tongbai, but he hopes they will stay away from him. Meina wants Yuncan to acknowledge Tongbai or she will reveal everything to Yuncan's wife-to-be. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亲子鉴定结果显示允灿和桐白是亲属关系。允灿跟美娜见面，答应让她和桐白衣食无忧，希望她们不要扰乱他的生活。美娜要允灿跟桐白相认，否则将一切告知允灿的另一半。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Wenzhi brings Zhenghou home to meet Mingxi, hoping to establish whether Zhenghou is the Healer. Mingxi shows Zhenghou the photo of her late daughter, Zhian. Zhenghou is shocked to find that Zhian and Yingxin are the same person. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)文植怀疑正厚就是Healer，于是将他带到自己家，想让明熙与他见面来判断正厚是不是那天夜闯入他家的Healer。明熙带正厚到她的房间，向他介绍了照片中早逝的女儿智安。正厚惊讶地发现智安就是英信，内心崩溃不已。.

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Zhenghou questions Wenhao for lying to him that Zhian is dead. Wenhao explains that he did so in order to protect Zhian. Zhenghou angrily warns Wenhao not to intervene between Yingxin and him anymore. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正厚知道文浩骗他智安死了，十分生气地去找文浩问个清楚。文浩解释不让人知道智安还活着是为了保护她。愤怒的正厚警告文浩从今以后不要再插手他和英信的事。.

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 4
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. First, the celebrity pop singers featured in that episode (there are usually three total) are shown singing one of their well-known songs in the studio. Fans are shown singing along simultaneously in UGC clips showing people singing into their computers or mobile phones from wherever they are. Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. 《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 21
programme.desc: Rongtai receives a surprise phone call from Yin Chunshang who informs Rongtai that he will pick Rongtai up to go to Switzerland together. Rongtai informs Jinben immediately. Jinben suspects that is a trap but Rongtai volunteers to be a bait to help Jinben arrest Yin Chunshang and Shen Yuzhe. (PG-些许暴力画面)(双声道-中/韩)容泰意外接到了尹春尚的电话，得知尹春尚会派车来接自己，一起去瑞士。容泰立刻告知金本，金本认为此行太过危险，恐怕是个陷阱，但容泰自愿成为捕捉尹春尚和沈宇哲的诱饵，决定要帮金本捉他们。.

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 22

What will Hari have to sacrifice in order to capture the man who made him lose everything? Arivaan, an intense psychological thriller, pits two men in a brutal cat and mouse game.
